ukfsr 0.0.0.9000

Package index

Indicator functions

Indicator helpers

Functions to help with indicators.

check_indicator()
Test whether a string is a valid UKFSR indicator id
parse_indicator()
Parse a UKFSR indicator id into its components

Graphics helpers

theme_ukfsr()
UKFSR chart theme

S3 bucket operations

Functions that intertact with the bucket.

s3_bucket()
Location of the UKFSR2024 Amazon S3 bucket
bucket_manifest()
Get contents of the UKFSR S3 bucket
save_csv()
Save UKFSR data for publication to the S3 bucket
save_graphic()
Save a UKFSR graphic to the S3 bucket

Built in datasets

Its helpful to have some data to test the package functions with.

bdloss
Best estimates of the proportions of species threatened with extinction in the Red List Index, by species group, 2021
prodsupply
UK production:supply ratio for food
